_note1: audience-base should not have trailing slash, :<port> appended at runtime
_note2: toggle audience-with-port to not append, in case you want a proxy and node.js doesn't really know the outward facing port
_note3: client-sessions-secret should be set in local config to a random value

aws._note1: id and secret can be obtained from AWS at: My Account > Security Credentials > Access Credentials > Access Keys
aws._note2: read-capacity and write-capacity are used when creating new tables only

dropbox._note: key and secret must be set in local config to values provided by dropbox
